name: Shadow Assassin
description: A master of stealth and poison, capable of eliminating targets without being detected.

name: Arcane Scholar
description: A brilliant mage who has mastered the ancient arts of elemental manipulation.

name: Forest Ranger
description: A skilled hunter who can track any creature through the wilderness.

name: Village Blacksmith
description: A hardworking crafter who can forge weapons and armor from raw materials.

name: Dragon Slayer
description: A legendary warrior blessed with the power to defeat the mightiest dragons.

name: Frost Mage
description: A spellcaster who harnesses the power of ice and snow to freeze enemies.

name: Celestial Priest
description: A divine healer blessed by the gods with incredible restoration powers.

name: Tavern Keeper
description: A friendly innkeeper who knows all the local gossip and stories.

name: Storm Caller
description: A powerful sorcerer who can summon lightning and control the weather.

name: Shadow Walker
description: A mysterious figure who can move between dimensions and phase through walls.
